Desc.entry: Parish church for Fir Vale and the majority of Firth Park. Grade II listed building. Used as a venue for weddings and baptisms. Newcomers and visitors are actively welcomed by the inclusive and friendly congregation. Has an active membership of around 80, across all ages. Aims to be a centre of Christian worship and local community activity.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 10am (Holy Communion, Sunday school and creche) & 5.30pm (Evensong), Monday Service at 7pm (Healing Eucharist), Mon at 2pm (Women's Fellowship), Wed 1-2.30pm (Open Play Experience), 1st Wed in the month at 10am (Mothers' Union), Thurs at 9am (Morning Prayer), Thurs 9.30-11.30am (parents and toddlers), one Sat in the month 10am-12noon (Cuthbert Kids for children aged 8-12 years), also runs Cuthberts Youth for young people aged 13-18 years held at another venue, please contact for details
